survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons utilize digital resources provided by public libraries, including e-books, online databases, and virtual programming, to improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases) from your public library?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases) from your public library?

questions.question_text: Which types of digital resources do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Virtual library programs (e.g., webinars, book clubs)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection with an optional open-field 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of digital resources do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Virtual library programs (e.g., webinars, book clubs)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from using digital library resources more often?
answer_options: Lack of awareness about available resources
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an open-text field for additional barriers not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with optional open-text comment.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from using digital library resources more often?
answer_options: Lack of awareness about available resources
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected anything other than 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of e-books available through your library?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of e-books available through your library?

questions.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like your library to offer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like your library to offer?
